latestInspection.result: Inspection Result:     Compliance Inspection of Open Violations - Reinspection Required

infractions.Violation Summary: School-based child care determined to have failed to clear staff and conduct pre-employment verification School-based program fails to take required action in response to clearance findings
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service operating without a permit Permit expired
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to provide constant and competent supervision for children within its care
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to maintain required staff to child supervision ratios at time of inspection
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection hallways and other means of egress were observed obstructed and impassable
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service allows staff to perform their duties that are not healthy or are incapable of carrying out their duties Staff medical clearances are not maintained by child care service
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At the time of inspection child care service failed to maintain a minimum of 30 square feet of space per child
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to conduct business and employment reference checks of staff/volunteers
